arguments.argument:
str[0] = "Alright, [Grax.] We're back. I assume you named the rest of the apples and gave each of them false memories too?" str[1] = "Yes. I only gave names to the last two apples, though. I named them [Gertrude] and [Soap.]" str[2] = "What about the male red apple? And all of the green apples?!" str[3] = "There were way too many, so I just thought 'screw it.' If these apples are actually the punks that [Frank] will rely off of so much, then surely they'll be resourceful enough to name themselves. That goes for the red apple, too." str[4] = "Ugh. I should have been in charge of the [Bots,] not you! You're too clumsy." str[5] = "Blame [Seth.]" str[6] = "Oh sure. That's what you always say. So did you mess anything else up?" str[7] = "Yes, actually. In hindsight, I think I somehow got [Tex] and [Elemna] mixed up. I'm colorblind, so I have an excuse." str[8] = "YOU IDIOT! This will probably mess everything up! You better go fix everything right now!" str[9] = "It's too late. The apple deployment process has already been launched. The male red apple is already fighting with the [Evil Toaster.]" str[10] = "I... I give up..." str[11] = "Oh, come on. This is just the beginning.*"
img[0] = EchagonFace img[1] = GraxFace img[2] = EchagonFace img[3] = GraxFace img[4] = EchagonFace img[5] = GraxFace img[6] = EchagonFace img[7] = GraxFace img[8] = EchagonFace img[9] = GraxFace img[10] = EchagonFace img[11] = GraxFace
name[0] = "Echagon" name[1] = "Grax" name[2] = "Echagon" name[3] = "Grax" name[4] = "Echagon" name[5] = "Grax" name[6] = "Echagon" name[7] = "Grax" name[8] = "Echagon" name[9] = "Grax" name[10] = "Echagon" name[11] = "Grax"
event_inherited();
